participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Emily is optimistic and nurturing, always looking forward to new experiences while balancing her responsibilities.
participant_1.background: i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Michael is introspective and candid, often reflecting on his past experiences while being open about his struggles.
participant_2.background: i'm a 45 year old male. i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i now live in the city.
